text: @realDonaldTrump There is no evidence plane and train passengers in the US are being tested for the coronavirus at all, let alone both when they get on and get off as Trump stated, US airlines and rail company Amtrak are not doing screening. Another pants  on fire moment  brought to you by Trump.
